response.original_title: 2013 KIM JAE JOONG GRAND FINALE LIVE CONCERT AND FAN MEETING IN JAPAN
response.overview: Kim Jae Joong’s first solo concert package at the Yokohama Arena in Japan! After the Tokyo Dome concert, the first reunion with Jae Joong was filled with the passionate cheers of fans at the Yokohama Arena.  In June 2013, he held a 3-day fan meeting and solo concert at the Yokohama Arena, selling out all 45,000 seats.  During the fan meeting, Jae Joong shared personal photos and videos of himself enjoying Yokohama, while connecting with fans through a Q&A session where he answered questions warmly.  In the mini-concert, he transformed into a rocker, delivering a stunning live performance of 12 songs, including tracks from his 1st album like MINE and famous Japanese songs such as Precious.  The 2013 KIM JAE JOONG GRAND FINALE LIVE CONCERT AND FAN MEETING IN JAPAN DVD captures Jae Joong’s heartfelt communication with fans and his powerful, genuine performance, showcasing both his soft and strong sides as a true rocker.
response.title: 2013 KIM JAE JOONG GRAND FINALE LIVE CONCERT AND FAN MEETING IN JAPAN
